title: AFKs are becoming ridiculous.
body: I get one almost every other game in bronze 3. Riot needs harsher punishments for AFKs. The punishment is potato if you AFK like 5 games in a short amount of time you get stuck with a 10 minute queue time for like 10 games. Thats fucking gay, I can go watch anime or do fucking anything to pass that tiny amount of time it barely would affect me. Its stupid riot.

replies.body: your an idiot if you think everyone thinks that for some people tht 10 mins  are hell and if you get to 20 oh lord its like getting a blowjob from your best friend who is distorted ugly and fat. Would you like that hmmmmm????

What are you even trying to say?
IM trying to say that for some people that 20 minutes is maddening
I am at work answering calls for customer service, and reading your response after reading that absurd comment made me laugh in the middle of helping an angry customer.
I get leaverbuster from afk in 2 games in like a week

In bronze I love afks. Less feeders on my team. I won my promos with an afk every game xD  ( yes I carried) look deeeeep into my history if you dare and I had a ranked game loooong ago where it was 2v5 from the beginning and I was draven with top lane Darius. We won that game easily lol
There have been quite a bit of trolls/AFK (dc too) lately... Before I would rarely see it, but then suddenly I see it every game.

AFK, rage quit, and leavers should get more serious and instant punishment.

At least a toxic and troll player is still moving and being 1% more productive than somebody that isn't in game.
